explanation1: Wearablock Inc. is a company that uses blockchain (NFT) technology to digitize fashion items.
explanation2: The fashion NFT can be used in various ways such as fashion marketing and digital guarantee.
explanation3: Furthermore, in the upcoming metaverse era, fashion NFTs will be a powerful means of expressing one's personality.
solution: Wearablock Inc. offers all the solutions for fashion NFTs.
solution1Desc: Decide the concept, quantity, NFT interface, etc. according to the fashion brand.
solution2Desc: Create 3D digital fashion that fit the concept.
solution3Desc: Mint a fashion NFT that can be traded on the NFT marketplace.
solution4Desc: Provides a dApp with NFT verification.
solution5Desc: Provides marketing and communities that can be used in NFT ecosystems such as Discord.
